parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the object around where the unit finds cover. The minDist, visibilityPosition and ignoreObject parameters are optional.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Not implemented in Arma 2 or Arma 3, always returns [[objNull]]</value></part></template>
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''findCover''' [position, hidePosition, maxDist, minDist, visibilityPosition, ignoreObject] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [position, hidePosition, maxDist, minDist, visibilityPosition, ignoreObject]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position]] </value></part><part><name/>=<value>Paramater 3
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> hidePosition: [[Array]] - format [[getHideFrom]]. Position of that which the unit should hide from </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> maxDist: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> minDist: [[Number]] (Optional)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> visibilityPosition: [[Array]] - format [[Position]] (Optional) used to select cover that unit can see in that direction from</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER7</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> ignoreObject: [[Object]] (Optional) Ignore this object in visibility check</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER8</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - always [[objNull]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> - </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getHideFrom]], [[setHideBehind]], [[isHidden]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
